# datapower_httpuseragent (Resource)

User agent
  - CLI Alias: `user-agent`

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "datapower_httpuseragent" "test" {
  id         = "HTTPUserAgent_test"
  app_domain = "acc_test_domain"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `app_domain` (String) The name of the application domain the object belongs to
- `id` (String) Name of the object. Must be unique among object types in application domain.

### Optional

- `add_header_policies` (Attributes List) Header injection policy
  - CLI Alias: `add-header-policy` (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--add_header_policies))
- `allow_compression_policies` (Attributes List) Allow compression policy
  - CLI Alias: `compression-policy` (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--allow_compression_policies))
- `basic_auth_policies` (Attributes List) Basic authentication policy
  - CLI Alias: `basicauth` (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--basic_auth_policies))
- `ftp_policies` (Attributes List) FTP client policy
  - CLI Alias: `ftp-policy` (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--ftp_policies))
- `header_retention_policies` (Attributes List) Header retention policy
  - CLI Alias: `headerretention-policy` (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--header_retention_policies))
- `http_version_policies` (Attributes List) HTTP version policy
  - CLI Alias: `http-version-policy` (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--http_version_policies))
- `identifier` (String) HTTP request-header
  - CLI Alias: `identifier`
- `max_redirects` (Number) Max redirects
  - CLI Alias: `max-redirects`
  - Range: `0`-`128`
  - Default value: `8`
- `proxy_policies` (Attributes List) Proxy policy
  - CLI Alias: `proxy` (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--proxy_policies))
- `pubkey_auth_policies` (Attributes List) Public key authentication policy
  - CLI Alias: `pubkeyauth` (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--pubkey_auth_policies))
- `restrict10_policies` (Attributes List) Restrict to HTTP/1.0 policy (deprecated)
  - CLI Alias: `restrict-http-policy` (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--restrict10_policies))
- `sftp_policies` (Attributes List) SFTP client policy
  - CLI Alias: `sftp-policy` (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--sftp_policies))
- `smtp_policies` (Attributes List) SMTP client policy
  - CLI Alias: `smtp-policy` (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--smtp_policies))
- `soap_action_policies` (Attributes List) SOAPAction policy

- `ssl_policies` (Attributes List) TLS profile policy
  - CLI Alias: `ssl` (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--ssl_policies))
- `timeout` (Number) Timeout

### Nested Schema for `add_header_policies`

Required:

- `add_header` (String) Name
- `add_value` (String) Value
- `reg_exp` (String) URL matching expression


<a id="nestedatt--allow_compression_policies"></a>
### Nested Schema for `allow_compression_policies`

Required:

- `reg_exp` (String) URL matching expression

Optional:

- `allow_compression` (Boolean) Allow Compression
  - Default value: `false`


<a id="nestedatt--basic_auth_policies"></a>
### Nested Schema for `basic_auth_policies`

Required:

- `reg_exp` (String) URL matching expression
- `user_name` (String) Username

Optional:

- `password` (String) Password (deprecated)
- `password_alias` (String) Password alias
  - Reference to: `datapower_passwordalias:id`


<a id="nestedatt--ftp_policies"></a>
### Nested Schema for `ftp_policies`

Required:

- `reg_exp` (String) URL matching expression

Optional:

- `auth_tls` (String) Encrypt command connection
  - Choices: `auth-off`, `auth-tls-opt`, `auth-tls-req`, `auth-tls-imp`
  - Default value: `auth-off`
- `data_type` (String) Data type
  - Choices: `ascii`, `binary`
  - Default value: `binary`
- `encrypt_data` (String) Encrypt file transfers
  - Choices: `enc-data-off`, `enc-data-opt`, `enc-data-req`
  - Default value: `enc-data-off`
- `passive` (String) Passive mode
  - Choices: `pasv-off`, `pasv-opt`, `pasv-req`
  - Default value: `pasv-req`
- `quoted_commands` (String) Quoted commands
  - Reference to: `datapower_ftpquotecommands:id`
- `size_check` (String) Size check
  - Choices: `size-check-optional`, `size-check-disabled`
  - Default value: `size-check-optional`
- `slash_stou` (String) Write unique file name if trailing slash
  - Choices: `slash-stou-off`, `slash-stou-on`
  - Default value: `slash-stou-on`
- `use_ccc` (String) Stop command encryption after authentication
  - Choices: `ccc-off`, `ccc-opt`, `ccc-req`
  - Default value: `ccc-off`

### Nested Schema for `header_retention_policies.header_retention`

Optional:

- `accept__encoding` (Boolean) Accept-Encoding
  - Default value: `false`
- `mqmd` (Boolean) MQMD
  - Default value: `false`
- `range` (Boolean) Range
  - Default value: `false`
- `te` (Boolean) TE
  - Default value: `false`



<a id="nestedatt--http_version_policies"></a>
### Nested Schema for `http_version_policies`

Required:

- `reg_exp` (String) URL matching expression

Optional:

- `http2_required` (Boolean) Require HTTP/2
  - Default value: `false`
- `version` (String) HTTP version
  - Choices: `HTTP/1.0`, `HTTP/1.1`, `HTTP/2`
  - Default value: `HTTP/1.1`

### Nested Schema for `proxy_policies`

Required:

- `reg_exp` (String) URL matching expression
- `remote_port` (Number) Remote port

Optional:

- `remote_address` (String) Remote host
- `skip` (Boolean) Skip
  - Default value: `false`

- `ssh_client_profile` (String) SSH client profile

Optional:

- `use_unique_filenames` (Boolean) Use unique file names
  - Default value: `false`


<a id="nestedatt--smtp_policies"></a>
### Nested Schema for `smtp_policies`

Optional:

- `auth` (String) Authentication method
  - Choices: `plain`, `login`
  - Default value: `plain`
- `options` (Attributes) Options (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--smtp_policies--options))
- `recipient` (String) Recipient e-mail
- `reg_exp` (String) URL matching expression
  - Default value: `dpsmtp://*`
- `sender` (String) Sender e-mail
- `subject` (String) Subject

<a id="nestedatt--smtp_policies--options"></a>
### Nested Schema for `smtp_policies.options`

Optional:

- `auth` (Boolean) Authentication
  - Default value: `false`
- `start_tls` (Boolean) STARTTLS
  - Default value: `false`

### Nested Schema for `ssl_policies`

Required:

- `reg_exp` (String) URL matching expression

Optional:

- `ssl_client` (String) TLS client profile
  - Reference to: `datapower_sslclientprofile:id`
- `ssl_client_config_type` (String) TLS client type
  - Choices: `proxy`, `client`
  - Default value: `proxy`

### Nested Schema for `upload_chunked_policies`

Required:

- `reg_exp` (String) URL matching expression

Optional:

- `upload_chunked` (Boolean) Chunk body of HTTP/1.1 requests
  - Default value: `false`
